data.message: Hookify rules are effective for blocking file access and bash command patterns. 5 safety invariants (S1, S3, S5, S6, S7) can be enforced with simple regex-based PreToolUse hooks. The remaining invariants (S2 sink scrubbing, S4 prod detection, S8 telemetry) require different mechanisms: PostToolUse hooks, orchestrator-level checks, or logging infrastructure.
